task.title: Fix broken objects in a failed test execution

taskbody.context: After Time Capsule is triggered by the exception com.kms.katalon.core.webui.exception.WebElementNotFoundException: Web element with id ... not found , do as follows:

step.cmd: Click on Click here to fix broken Test Object link in:

li.p: The Log Viewer of the failed test case.
The Result tab of the test suite that contains the failed test case.

step.stepresult: opens the Object Spy dialog with the captured state of the AUT.

step.cmd: In the displayed AUT, capture the object again.
step.stepresult: The captured object is updated in the Object Spy dialog.

step.cmd: Click Save to keep the changes made to the captured object.

taskbody.result: You can run your test again with the updated test object.
